backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining card metadata types, access control, storage mixins, and endpoints for card operations including add and transform.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old card records to the new format by adding a default team field and returning updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test references for Brewers card catalog enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summary file mapping frontend source paths to concise descriptions of each component or page.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions using OKLCH colors and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root element, Brewers favicon, metadata, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application root configuring routes, layout, theming, and admin-protected import page.
frontend/src/components/AddCardDialog.ts: Dialog component for adding new cards via image recognition or manual entry, defaulting team to Milwaukee Brewers.
frontend/src/components/AddWishlistDialo: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
Guards routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing loading, login, or access denied screens before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/CameraCapture.ts: Provides camera capture UI with support checks, switching cameras, error handling, and returning a captured photo file.
frontend/src/components/CardDetailDialog: Displays a detailed card dialog with tabs, price refresh, editing, and deletion actions using card metadata.
frontend/src/components/CardGrid.tsx: Renders a grid of card items and opens a detail dialog when a card is selected.
frontend/src/components/CardItem.tsx: Shows a card preview with image, metadata, and price, highlighting AI-recognized cards.
frontend/src/components/EditCardDialog.t: Dialog for editing card data, including metadata fields and optional image upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/FilterSidebar.ts: Sidebar providing search and filter controls derived from loaded cards, with reset and active filter indicators.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header with branding, admin import button, and login/logout handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ImageRecognition: Form that uploads or captures an image, runs card recognition, and populates fields with confidence indicators before submitting.
frontend/src/components/ManualCardForm.t: Manual entry form for creating a card with required fields, image upload, validation, and progress‑tracked upload.
frontend/src/components/PriceHistoryChar: Displays a card’s price history using a Recharts line chart with loading and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/ValueTrendsSumma: Summarizes recent price changes across cards, showing top movers with percent change indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored‑identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating card data, user profiles, and admin state using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with Brewers-themed color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/cardRecognition.ts: Implements multi-stage card recognition with mocked primary and fallback OCR methods, returning confidence-scored metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CardCatalog.tsx: Renders the card catalog with filters, search, pagination, value summary, and an add-card dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ImportPage.tsx: Handles CSV and image-based bulk card import with parsing, upload progress, and error reporting.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for wishlist functionality.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, scanning source files, and extending theme tokens for colors, layout, shadows, and animations. It imports typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, schema version, goals, existing features, and architectural notes for building a Brewers card database with search and bulk import workflows.
